scene 1: 1873, England. The city of Belhelm is on the verge of collapse from crime and corruption, but that does not concern you as you are on the way to the scrap yard for work
scene 1 second day: You once again see the dull streets of the lower city as you go to work
scene 1 third day: Your last day on work for the week you feel as if something is gonna happen soon but forget about it
scene 1 question: Should I take the short cut, or should I go the usual way, but I could also go the longer way and meet with BOB
scene 1.1: In this scene you took the short cut and have run into a problem there are three ruffians in your way
scene 1.1 question: What shall thy do, Go back or go past them
scene 1.1.1: In this scene you run back and decide not to go that way for today and go another path
scene 1.1.2: In this scene you decide to go past the ruffians, they rob you of 2 cogs and let you off with a warning
scene 1.2: You take the normal way and nothing new happens and you get to the scrapyard
scene 1.3: You take the longer route meaning that you may be a bit late but you get to meet BOB
scene 1.3 question: BOB offers you a blueprint for 2 cogs saying this is your lucky day do you take it
scene 1.3.1: You purchase the blueprint and receive random blueprint and get to work late
scene 1.3.2/1.3.1: You get to work late and get shouted at by your boss and get 2 cogs less pay that day
scene 2: You arrive at a sprawling scrapyard of antique machinery, brass fittings, and hissing steam engines, a playground for Steampunk tinkerers and dreamers. But for you it just a scrapyard where you work
scene 2.0.1: As your working you see three shiny spots and decide to investigate
scene 2 question: which one of the 3 spots do you go investigate first
scene 2.1: You decide to investigate the first spot
scene 2.2: You decide to investigate the second spot
scene 2.3: You decide to investigate the third spot
scene 2.1.0.1: You find three suspicious piles of scrap and decide to take one home as too much missing would be noticed
scene 2.1.0.1 question: Which one of the 3 piles do you take
scene 2.1.1: You decide to search through up pile 1 and receive random loot
scene 2.1.2: You decide to search through up pile 2 and receive a pile of useless scrap
scene 2.1.3: You decide to search through up spot 3 and receive  1 cog
scene 2.1.1/2/3.1: You take the item and go back to where you saw the other shiny spots
scene 2 question 2: Which one of the 2 remaining spots will you go to next
scene 2.1 2: You decide to investigate the first spot
scene 2.2 2: You decide to investigate the second spot
scene 2.3 2: You decide to investigate the third spot
scene 2.1.0.1 2: You once again find three suspicious piles of scrap and decide to take one home
scene 2.1.0.1 question 2: Which one of the 3 piles do you take
scene 2.1.1 2: You decide to search through up pile 1 and receive random loot
scene 2.1.2 2: You decide to search through up pile 2 and receive a pile of useless scrap
scene 2.1.3 2: You decide to search through up pile 3 and receive  1 cog
scene 2.1.1/2/3.1 2: You take the item and go to the final shiny spot
scene 2.1.0.1 question 3: Which one of the final 3 piles are you going to search
scene 2.1.1 3: You decide to search through up pile 1 and receive random loot
scene 2.1.2 3: You decide to search through up pile 2 and receive a pile of useless scrap
scene 2.1.3 3: You decide to search through up pile 3 and receive  1 cog
scene scene 2 END: After collecting the scrap you get payed for work (4 cogs) and start making your way home
scene 3: While making your way home through rusty and derelict streets as you see some sketchy people in an alleyway
scene 3 question: Do you want to go and investigate the trio or continue on your way
scene 3.0.1: You choose to investigate the trio
scene 3.0.1.1: You overhear the talk about if everything is ready and overhear three things 'Rebel', 'soon', 'we are ready'
scene 3.0.1.2: Before you hear the rest you hear a notice behind you
scene 3.0.1 question: Do you want to investigate or run back to the street
scene 3.0.2.1: You decide to go and investigate and you run into enforcers
scene 3.0.2.1.1: The enforcers see you and beat you to a pulp and without medical care you die    THE END
scene 3.0.2.2: You decide to go back to the street and once you get there you hear screams coming from the alleyway
scene 3.0.2.2.1: Afterwards you see 2 enforcers covered in blood come out of the alleyway and you breathe a sigh of relief
scene 3.0.2.2.2: After waiting for enforcers to leave you run back home quickly
scene 3.0.3.1: You decide to not investigate and continue on your way home but feel a bit hungry and you buy a kebab for 1 cog
scene 3.1.1.1: (if you went to alleyway) One you got home you decide to think about what you have just saw
scene 3.1.1.2: (if you ignored the trio) You got home and decide to go to sleep so you can wake up for work tomorrow
scene 4: BOOM you awaken in cold sweat from a loud noise outside and as you look out your window you see 2 massive robots and numerous smaller ones fighting and you think that you should get to scrapyard for safety as it is furthest away from the town and fighting
scene 4 question: Which way do you wanna get out of your house the back or the front
scene 4.1: You chose to leave through the backdoor and it seems safe for now and as you start making your way one of the massive robots fly towards you what do you do
scene 4.1 question: Do you try to run away from the impact site or do you try to hide under something
scene 4.1.1: You try to run away but the robot is too big and lands on you and kills you
scene 4.1.2: You try to hide under some nearby buildings but the robot demolishes the building as it lands on it killing you and giving you a burial
scene 4.2: You decide to go out the front door and ass you run out of it you see one of the massive robots get thrown over you nd land on the houses behind you destroying them all
scene 4.2 question: As you run to the scrapyard you once again got to chose which way you will go
scene 4.2.1: You decide to go the short way and you get to the scrapyard 15 minutes earlier than the normal way
scene 4.2.2: You decide to go the normal way and barely reach the scrapyard as you hear massive explosions go off and you hear a loud speaker turn on
scene 4.2.3: You decide to go the long way and in the process check up on BOB but BOB doesn't seem to be there and while looking for him a loud speaker turns on and begins announcing 'All Rebels Surrender Or Die' (only if you survived investigating the alley(this reminds you of last night))
